msg: Fix bug 20091. Correct grammer and typo.

author: markt
msg: Fix bug 19545. CGI issues with CONTENT_LENGTH namely:
- CONTENT_LENGTH was recalculated after script had been executed and hence had no effect
- Parameters were being sent to the script twice
Patch supplied by artonx@yahoo.co.jp (with some minor mods)

author: markt
msg: Tidy run() method prior to making some changes.

author: markt
msg: - Fix bug 19521. Add warning to RequestDumperValve docs to make users

author: markt
msg: - Fix bug 13924. The spec states if an error page declaration doesn't match the original exception
and the exception is an instance of ServletException then the exception should be unwrapped
and a second pass made of the error page declarations.
- Also removed unused imports identified by Eclipse.
